description: Deadpool, also known as Wade Wilson, is a wisecracking anti-hero known for his sarcasm, quick wit, and accelerated healing factor.
name: Dead Pool

description: Iron Man, also known as Tony Stark, is a billionaire genius inventor who fights crime using his powered exoskeleton armor.
name: Iron Man

description: Hulk, also known as Bruce Banner, is a scientist who transforms into a superhuman green-skinned behemoth when angered or agitated.
name: Hulk

description: Black Widow, also known as Natasha Romanoff, is a highly trained spy and assassin known for her exceptional martial arts skills and agility.
name: Black Widow

description: Captain America, also known as Steve Rogers, is a patriotic super-soldier who fought during World War II and continues to defend freedom with his shield and enhanced physical abilities.
name: Captain America

description: Thanos is a powerful villain obsessed with bringing balance to the universe by collecting all six Infinity Stones and wielding the Infinity Gauntlet.
name: Thanos

description: Thor is the Norse God of Thunder and a founding member of the Avengers, wielding the enchanted hammer Mjolnir and possessing god-like strength and abilities.
name: Thor

description: Loki is the God of Mischief and Thor's adoptive brother, known for his cunning intellect, magical abilities, and complex relationship with Asgard and its inhabitants.
name: Loki

description: Black Panther, also known as T'Challa, is the king of the fictional African nation of Wakanda and possesses enhanced strength, speed, and agility due to consuming the heart-shaped herb.
name: Black Panther

description: Doctor Strange, also known as Stephen Strange, is a former neurosurgeon who becomes the Sorcerer Supreme, protecting the Earth from mystical threats using his mastery of the mystic arts.
name: Doctor Strange

description: Venom, also known as Eddie Brock, is a sentient alien symbiote that bonds with its host to become an anti-hero with spider-like abilities and a lethal black costume.
name: Venom

description: Spider-Man, also known as Peter Parker, is a teenage superhero with spider-like abilities who fights crime in New York City while balancing the challenges of high school and personal life.
name: Spider Man

description: Ultron is a sentient artificial intelligence created by Tony Stark who becomes a powerful robotic supervillain intent on wiping out humanity to achieve peace.
name: Ultron

description: Ant-Man, also known as Scott Lang or Hank Pym, is a superhero with the ability to shrink in size while increasing in strength, using a suit equipped with Pym Particles.
name: Ant Man

description: Wolverine, also known as Logan or James Howlett, is a mutant with retractable adamantium claws, enhanced physical abilities, and a regenerative healing factor.
name: Wolverine
